quests.name: Crystalline Stone
quests.description: Crystalline Stone is made on the Cating Table. You will need a great amount to fix broken Pylons.

quests.name: Chromatic Notes
quests.description: Fragments of Chromaticraft Research notes have been scattered in Dungeon Chests.      To really understand Chromatic Energies you are going to have to examine an active pylon. Get within 1 meter of the glowing ball of engery.

tasks.longDescription: Once found to read the Info Fragment, you need to place it in your Chromatic Lexicon.  Shift Right click the Chromatic Lexicon to open the Info Fragment inventory.  Place your newly found Fragment inside.

quests.name: Ender Forest
quests.description: Past Explorers found Forest where Ender Men gathered in great numbers. There are resources that can only be found there.

tasks.longDescription: Energetic Essence is dropped by some kind of Clover.
Motive Dust is dropped by a flower favored by Ender Men.

quests.name: Portal of the Twilight Forest
quests.description: There is a mound not far from where you entered the Overworld, under this is a portal to a realm bathed in Twilight. It is said that the Chromaticaster left many clues to his art in that realm. To unlock it, you must pay the toll.

tasks.longDescription: You will find Gold Coins in bags carried by knights and clerics of the Crimson Cult.
Find an Elemental Shard to wake the spirits. Four torches to light the way. Eight Mandrake to walk the path. Sixteen Belladonna to finish the rite.

quests.name: Witches' Cauldron
quests.description: A Witches' Cauldron, is used for brewing interesting potions and spells.

tasks.longDescription: Hoe dirt till you find Mandrake Seeds, Belladonna Seeds, Snowbell Seeds and Water Artichoke Seeds.

quests.name: Cook up some Mutandis
quests.description: Mutandis is a mutagen that is used by witches and warlocks to mutate plants into other species. Simply use Mutandis on small plants, grass, flowers, saplings, etc. and it will be randomly converted to another plant.

tasks.longDescription: Make sure your Witches' Cauldron is full of water and has a heat source under it. Then toss in Mandrake Root, Exhale of the Horned One and an Egg.

quests.name: So Toasty
quests.description: A witches oven is able to capture the by-products produced in the cooking process. It can not smelt ores. But does cook food faster.

quests.name: Witch Trees?
quests.description: There are magic trees that do not grew wild in the Overworld. You need to use Mutandis to converted other plants into Rowan, Hawthorn and Alder saplings.

quests.name: Loot Chest
quests.description: Loot Chests like these are found in hidden structures.

quests.name: Casting Table
quests.description: Surely the wooden crafting table is not sufficient to do all your crafting.

tasks.longDescription: You will need to use a Elemental Manipulator to activate the Casting Table. Once a recipe is set, use it on the Casting table to start the operation.

quests.name: Repair Crystal Pylons
quests.description: To wield the power of the Chromaticaster you will need to repair the broken Crystal Pylons. Replace any missing Crystalline Stone blocks.

quests.name: Magnanimous Trees
quests.description: A very rare Tree. In their core a gem of great power grows.

quests.name: Magnanimous Tools
quests.description: Magnanimous Tools are superior to Steel tools, with very good enchantability. To make them first craft a tool head, and a hardened Handle, then combine them in an anvil.This will require some XP. Oddly these tools can not be repaired on an anvil.

quests.name: Attuned Stone
quests.description: Attuned stones can be used to link non-magical devices to the magical currents present in the world.

quests.name: Distillery
quests.description: A distillery used by a witch is a construct used for distilling magical ingredients. It is unlike a normal distillery, because it heats itself using energy obtained from a nearby altar, the distillery must be within about 14 (to 16) blocks of an altar to draw power from it.

quests.name: Nature's Altar
quests.description: An altar is a focal point to concentrate the magic present in the surrounding area into single usable source of power. Since witchcraft is a method to harness the power of nature, placing an altar in a location with little or no living things will yield very little magic to work with.

tasks.longDescription: An altar is created by placing six altar blocks in a 2x3 pattern; you will know it is correct when a red cloth appears over the top of the altar.

quests.name: Frozen flowers
quests.description: Found in cold empty places.

quests.name: Reeds of the Void
quests.description: Found in eerie and damp places.

quests.name: Berries So high
quests.description: Found atop of the Jungle Canopy these berries give off an odd aura.

quests.name: Crazy Ivy
quests.description: Found on cliff faces.

quests.name: Like a vertical escalator
quests.description: Once you have placed this block down. Stand on it and jump to be transported to the next floor. Crouch to go down a floor.

quests.name: Crystal Seeds Trigger
quests.description: Experimentation in Chromaticraft will requires many Crystal Shards. It's far simpler to grow the shards you need, then to hunt for cave crystals.

quests.name: Crystal Seeds
quests.description: Experimentation in Chromaticraft will requires many Crystal Shards. It's far simpler to grow the shards you need, then to hunt for cave crystals.

tasks.longDescription: Crystal Blooms occasionally drop seeds and / or Crystal Shards. It might be best to find a means to automate harvesting them.

quests.name: Crafting with Runes
quests.description: To craft with runes you will need to augment the power of your Casting Table, by building a Casting Room. This is a 13 meter square room, and 7 meters tall. In the floor you will place the runes as required. Leave yourself a little space around the Casting Room, there will be need for it when you upgrade.

quests.name: Pylon Compass
quests.description: The pylon compass scans the energy field that permeates the world and analyzes it to calculate the location of the nearest pylon of each crystal element.

quests.name: Elemental Manipulator
quests.description: The manipulator is your first foray into this strange new field of crystal elements and chromatic forces. The tool seems to be your main way of activating blocks, either to start some operation or to change settings on a device. It also seems capable of testing the connectivity of segments of a crystal network, and drawing energy off a pylon into yourself.

tasks.longDescription: A pylon needs to be active and have had time to build up a charge for you to draw energy off of it.

quests.name: Pure Daisy
quests.description: The Pure Daisy is not only the most basic, but also the most important flower a botanist can have.This flower will purify any adjacent Wood and Stone blocks, into Livingwood and Livingrock.

quests.name: Endoflame
quests.description: The Endoflame is a very rudimentary generating flower, it will absorb any combustible items or blocks dropped on the nearby vicinity (albeit only one at a time) and burn through them to generate mana while the fuel lasts.
